Miles Sound System SDK 6.1c

AIL_set_3D_sample_preference

The function AIL_set_3D_sample_preference sets sample level preferences.

void AIL_set_3D_sample_preference(
  H3DSAMPLE S,
  char const * preference,
  void const * value
);

In Parameters

S
indicates the 3D sample handle to set the preference on.
preference
is a string variable describing the preference to set.
value
is a pointer to a variable containing the value to be set.

Discussion

Most providers also publish provider-specific, sample level preferences - see the provider information at the end of this chapter for details.

See the provider information at the end of this chapter for a list of each provider's preferences.

Example: To turn off the EAX effects on a particular sample, you could use the following code (you'd should usually want to use the AIL_set_3D_sample_effects_level function, though): 


F32 eax_amount=0.0; // from 0 (no effect) to 1.0 (full effect)
AIL_set_3D_sample_preference( eax_samp,
                              "EAX  sample reverb mix",
                              &eax_amount);
